# pylint: disable=C0103
"""
This file contains the configuration data for the 6.7-kW synchronous reluctance
motor drive.

"""
# %%
from __future__ import annotations
from dataclasses import dataclass


@dataclass

[docs]class ModelData:
    """
    System model data.

    """

[docs]    name: str = '6.7-kW synchronous reluctance motor drive'

    # Motor

[docs]    motor_type: str = 'synchronous motor'


[docs]    R_s: float = .54


[docs]    L_d: float = 41.5e-3


[docs]    L_q: float = 6.2e-3


[docs]    psi_f: float = 0


[docs]    p: int = 2

    # Mechanics

[docs]    J: float = .015


[docs]    B: float = 0


[docs]    w_M0: float = 0  # Initial rotor speed


[docs]    theta_M0: float = 0  # Initial rotor angle

    # Converter

[docs]    pwm_enabled: bool = False  # PWM disabled to fasten the simulation


[docs]    u_dc: float = 540  # DC-bus voltage

    # Computational delay

[docs]    delay: int = 1
